title: Did you eat the vault of the "green acre " of the pig who played Arnold Zevel?
subtitle: The Sardonique jokes were published about more than one beloved animal star who was allegedly eaten by invisible actors and crew members at the end of a shootout.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: At the farewell party held after the filming of the last episode of "The Green Cherry," they grilled the cast and the crew and ate the Burkin actor who played Arnold Zevel.
